articles.author: Kiki  Intarasuwan
articles.title: Australia Bondi Beach shooting suspects identified as father and son - CBS News
articles.description: The 50-year-old father was shot and killed by police, and the 24-year-old son is hospitalized, New South Wales Police Commissioner Mal Lanyon said.
articles.content:
Two suspected gunmen accused of killing 15 people and injuring dozens during a Hanukkah celebration in Australia have been identified as a father and a son, authorities said Sunday.
The 50-year-old … [+2085 chars]

articles.author: Ece Yildirim
articles.title: Grok Is Glitching and Spewing Misinformation About The Bondi Beach Shooting - Gizmodo
articles.description: Among other problems, the chatbot is spewing misinformation about the horrific Bondi Beach shooting in Australia.
articles.content:
Elon Musk’s AI chatbot Grok is glitching again.
This time, among other problems, the chatbot is spewing misinformation about the Bondi Beach shooting, in which at least eleven people were killed at … [+3073 chars]
